title.narrative: Bangladesh - Reaching Out of School Children Project

description.narrative: The key objective of the Project is to reduce the number of out-of-school children through improved access, quality and efficiency in primary education, especially for the disadvantaged children, in support of GOB's national EFA goal.

condition.narrative: DPE ensures every LC establishes and maintains a CMC until the completion of the project
DPE signs annually renewable Cooperation Agreement with each CMC
Establish and maintain a ROSC Committee to review policies and access progress and resolve any issues and conflicts
Maintain adequate policies/procedures to enable the ongoing M&E
Prepare a report integrating the results and progress and set out measures to ensure efficiency
